#summary How to help by translating text into other languages.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

Our goal is for Blockly to be available in as many languages as possible, so students don't have to struggle with English at the same time as they're learning computer science concepts.

We are in the process of moving translation from being a manual process to using [http://translatewiki.net translatewiki.net].  If you are interested in translating Blockly (and we hope you are), please create an account there and subscribe to the [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/blockly Blockly forum].
